mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT i.*, CASE WHEN i.inquiry_type = 'A' THEN r.user_id WHEN i.inquiry_type = 'B' THEN b.business_id END AS user_id, b.business_id FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN regular_user r ON i.inquiry_type = 'A' AND i.inquiry_ref_idx = r.idx LEFT JOIN business_user b ON i.inquiry_type = 'B' AND i.inquiry_ref_idx = b.business_idx WHERE i.inquiry_type = #{usertype} AND i.inquiry_ref_idx = #{idx} ORDER BY i.inquiry_id DESC ) j LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert:
select IFNULL(max(inquiry_id), 0) + 1 from inquiry
insert into inquiry (inquiry_type, inquiry_ref_idx, title, content, inquiry_file, original_file, register_date ) values (#{inquiry_type}, #{inquiry_ref_idx}, #{title}, #{content}, #{inquiry_file}, #{original_file}, current_timestamp)
